name: Theory Course on Matrices & Determinants - IIT JEE, 2023
description: In this course, Vineet Loomba will provide in-depth knowledge of Matrices Determinants. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation can enrol for the course. The course will be completed over 6 sessions with a duration of 90 minutes each. The course will be conducted in Hindi and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Matrices & Determinants: Algebra of Matrices and Special Matrices
Matrices & Determinants: Properties of Determinants - Part I
Matrices & Determinants: Properties of Determinants - Part II
Matrices & Determinants: Properties of Determinants - Part III
Matrices & Determinants: Properties of Determinants - Part II
Matrices & Determinants: Characteristic Equations and Cayley Hamilton Theorem
Matrices & Determinants: Adjoint and System of Linear Equations

author.bio: A game-changer in Mathematics, produced 100 percentilers in 2021/2022/2023, his courses are regarded as the Benchmark for IIT JEE aspirants.
